comments:
When building the test project a BCException occurs (Stack trace below).  It 
appears to be caused by the pointcut on line 10 of Tracing.aj, which 
incorrectly uses a type pattern in a this statement.  I think the problem is 
more specifically caused by the fact that the type pattern contains an 
annotation.



org.aspectj.weaver.BCException: bad

... we need to tighten up the parser here so that a type pattern in this(...) is
never allowed. For fixing in M3 whilst we have the parser open.
this was fixed as part of the fix for bug 107059
